Database - Class in com.tacticalenterprisesltd
The Database class performs all the necessary functions required to SELECT, UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE records.
This class supports the following database management systems: MySql (default) v5.0 or higher Oracle v12c or higher SQL Server v2012 or higher
Database(String) - Constructor for class com.tacticalenterprisesltd.Database
The default RDBMS type is MYSQL.
Database(String, Database.RDBMS) - Constructor for class com.tacticalenterprisesltd.Database
Use this constructor if you want to specify an RDBMS other than MYSQL.

DateFormat - Class in com.tacticalenterprisesltd

db_to_client_format(String, String) - Static method in class com.tacticalenterprisesltd.DateFormat
This convenience method expects a database Date value that adheres to this format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss The clientValue parameter can be any format you wish to provide as recognized by java.text.SimpleDateFormat.
DbClean - Interface in com.tacticalenterprisesltd
